creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: wavy vertical bands of light blue and white forms; overlapping rectangular indigo form across center from R with yellow strip at L end; rectangular red intaglio stamp with wavy lines and a circle, dark blue forms at L end; four white impressed swirl forms at lower center, one with a red "bulls eye" pattern, and two with yellow circle inside; another impressed swirl at LR with pink spot; black strip across top with white hash marks; orange band down L edge
signed: LRC, in pencil: [Rikio Takahashi, 1970] LLC, in pencil: [Seabathing]
title: Seabathing
